body.text: The Serco Advanced Virtual Assistant (Serco AVA) combines automated data extraction with an ML-based insight engine, using NLP and neural networks to extract meaning from maritime enterprise data and determine the appropriate contextually relevant micro-guidance or insights. The Serco AVA is an ML question-answering recommendation platform designed specifically for maritime technicians and operators.

items.text: The Serco Advanced Virtual Assistant can:

• Automatically extract information, meaning, and semantic relationships from structured, unstructured, and live maritime enterprise data including manuals, work orders, forms, and equipment sensor data.
• Understand context - user location and role, and equipment location/status - to provide intelligent guidance and curated insights to maritime users.
• Use a natural language conversational interface to provide users with augmented analytics insights and AI-enabled work instructions on desktop, mobile and wearable devices.
